description.value:
The creature attacks with its slam.

Attack - 1 Creature (5 ft.)

  • Hit: [[/r 2d6+3]] bludgeoning damage
The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.
Whenever the golem is subjected to fire damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the fire damage dealt.

The Iron Sentry releases a burst of fire centered on itself, affecting every creature in the radius except itself. Once used, the Iron Sentry cannot use this ability again until it completes a short rest or absorbs at least 5 fire damage at once.

+5 to hit, 1d10+3 slashing damage

The Iron Sentry attacks with its Sword.
The golem makes two melee attacks: one with its sword and one with its slam. In place of its sword attack, it can use Fiery Burst.

languages.custom: Understands the languages of its creator but can't speak
